channel.title: AWS on REDtalks.live
channel.description: Recent content in AWS on REDtalks.live

item.title: KNOWN ISSUE: Error: configmaps "aws-auth" already exists
item.description: Documented at: 10/14/2022 Review by: 12/01/2023 Overview The following is a common error with AWS EKS Module v17.x: Error: configmaps "aws-auth" already exists Example module use: module "eks" { source = "terraform-aws-modules/eks/aws" version = "17.

item.title: KNOWN ISSUE: terraform destroy fails on EKS cluster due to public subnet
item.description: Documented at: 10/14/2022 Review by: 12/01/2023 Overview Reaching an eventual timeout with the following is a common error with AWS EKS Module v17.x: module.vpc.aws_subnet.public[0]: Still destroying... When exposing an EKS service externally this can result in the creating of an external/public IP (AWS EIP).

item.title: Secure Service Networking on AWS for Dev/Test

item.title: REDtalks #018 - Enabling the docker TCP API in AWS
item.description: Not a traditional REDtalks post today (no interview/demo), but this took me a while to work outÂ so I thought I’d share. What’s this about? It all started with me building REST extensibility solutions for F5 Networks in AWS.
